description.message: Experimental version of unmatched adblock extension built on Manifest V3.

popup_protection_enabled_refresh.message: Protection is enabled <button>Refresh the page</button> to apply changes

popup_steps_experimental_description.message: Our alchemists know the ways to tame the MV3 challenges. Now AdGuard works with Manifest V3.

popup_steps_new_tech_description.message: We use top-notch approaches to adapt to the rapidly evolving and still improving MV3 framework.

popup_steps_fast_work_description.message: We’ve increased AdGuard’s performance by refactoring our content-blocking libraries and using MV3 features.

popup_steps_v3_manifest_description.message: You might notice only one result of AdGuard’s transition to MV3: even better performance.

options_languages_option_header_desc.message: Block ads for websites in these languages

options_custom_filters_option_desc.message: Add custom filters based on AdGuard filtering rules

options_static_filters_limits_by_rules.message: You’ve reached the limit of active built-in rules. To activate new rules, disable some built-in filters. <newline></newline> <link-to-limits>Rule limits</link-to-limits>

options_static_filters_limits_by_filters.message: You’ve reached the limit of active built-in filters. %current-enabled% of %maximum% built-in filters are enabled. <newline></newline> <link-to-limits>Rule limits</link-to-limits>
You’ve reached the limit of active built-in filters. Disable some built-in filters before activating new ones. <newline></newline> <link-to-limits>Rule limits</link-to-limits>

options_static_filters_limits_by_regexp.message: You’ve reached the limit of active built-in regex rules. %current-enabled% of %maximum% built-in filters are enabled. <newline></newline> <link-to-limits>Rule limits</link-to-limits>

options_static_filters_limits_after_upda.message: The browser has modified the list of active built-in filters. <newline></newline> <link-to-limits>See details</link-to-limits>

options_dynamic_rules_limit.message: You’ve reached the limit of user-added rules. %current-enabled% of %maximum% rules are enabled. Rules over the threshold are not active. <newline></newline> <link-to-limits>Rule limits</link-to-limits>

options_dynamic_rules_regexps_limit.message: You’ve reached the limit of user-added regex rules. %current-enabled% of %maximum% regex rules are enabled. Rules over the threshold are not active. <newline></newline> <link-to-limits>Rule limits</link-to-limits>

options_dynamic_rules_limit_on_page.message: You’ve reached the limit of user-added rules. %current-enabled% of %maximum% rules are enabled. Rules over the threshold are not active.

options_dynamic_rules_regexps_limit_on_p.message: You’ve reached the limit of user-added regex rules. %current-enabled% of %maximum% regex rules are enabled. Rules over the threshold are not active.

options_notice_program.message: This extension is an experimental project by the AdGuard team

popup_settings_disable_site_temporarily.message: Disable on this website for %count% seconds

popup_limits_warning.message: The browser has modified the list of active built-in filters.

options_custom_filter_modal_retry_descri.message: The file may be damaged or have the wrong format.

options_custom_filter_modal_url_already_.message: The filter at this URL has already been uploaded.

options_paste_filter_label.message: Filter URL or a local file path

options_paste_filter_url.message: Paste the filter URL or a local file path

error_rule_is_invalid.message: The rule is invalid. Check for unsupported modifiers, overly complex regular expressions, or syntax errors.

error_rules_limit.message: Failed to add the rule. The limit of %limit% rules has been exceeded.

error_regexp_rules_limit.message: Failed to add the rule. The limit of %limit% regex rules has been exceeded.

debugging_title_reload_page.message: Open developer tools and reload the page

debugging_info.message: Detailed info on requests with applied declarative rules is available in the debug version of the extension. To install the debug version, <link>clone the repository and build the extension</link>.

options_limits_warning_title.message: The browser has modified the list of active filters

options_limits_warning_desc_what_happene.message: The limit of active built-in rules was exceeded after an update or adding a new extension. As per Manifest V3, your Chrome browser reacted by disabling all the extension's built-in filters except the default ones.

options_limits_warning_desc_possible_act.message: Option 1. Delete unnecessary ad-blocking extensions from your browser. To reactivate the filters mentioned in the "Filters enabled before the update" section, click <button>reactivate filters</button>.

options_limits_warning_desc_app.message: Option 2. Install the AdGuard Ad Blocker app: it has no restrictions on filtering rules. <link>Get AdGuard Ad Blocker</link>

options_limits_warning_desc_close.message: Option 3. If you're satisfied with the currently enabled default filter(s), <button>close this warning</button>.

options_nav_better_than_extension.message: Unlike the extension, the AdGuard app blocks ads with no limitations.

options_limits_desc_specifications.message: This extension conforms to Manifest V3.

options_limits_dynamic_added.message: User-added rules, such as user rules and custom filters

options_limits_static_rulesets_desc.message: Built-in filters (e.g. Block annoyances or Language-specific filters). You can enable up to %count% static rulesets at once.

options_limits_static_rules_desc.message: Rules from built-in filters. All extensions in your Chrome browser can use %count% static rules at once.

options_limits_static_filters_limit_stil.message: Impossible to reactivate the filters: the rule limit is still exceeded.

options_custom_filter_modal_incorrect_fo.message: The file should be in .txt format
